title: Planet Earth
creator_credit: Ian Rosenbloom, Deborah Isaacs, Yorkshire Television and European Broadcasting Union
brief_description: This 4 part series is divided into sections for easy classroom viewing using a combination of the latest computer graphics and filmed examples of climatic occurrences to provide a detailed description and explanation of the geographical factors influencing Planet Earth.
creator_credit_for_label: Ian Rosenbloom, Deborah Isaacs, Yorkshire Television and European Broadcasting Union
